item.title: Not Koenraad Elst
item.description: May 4,1992 Dear Shri Khushwant Singh, Please accept my thanks for making it known (Hindustan Times, May 2) to a large number of people that Koenraad Elst exists in flesh and blood, and is not Sita Ram Goel’s invention or disguise. Far from being “made up by BJP’s propanganda wing”. most people in the RSS/BJP crowd believed and said that it was was I trying to pass under a foreign name and a changed style.
